name: Tactical Assassin
description:
Tactical Assassin lets you become a highly skilled Assassin that must use true killer instincts to complete each mission. The only way to achieve your objective is to think Tactically and imagine yourself behind the weapon.
You have a clear vision of your target, and have planned the shot. Make sure you get the kill and complete your objectives - this is no place to amateur assassins.
If you like First Person Shooter games, Sniper rifles, Guns and action then Tactical Assassin is definitely for you.

*Please Note*
Updating to 2.0 from a previous version will RESET your progress!
Also, you may see Ads in this update since the game is now Free.


17+ Not suitable for Children!

MINIMUM requirements :
iPhone 3GS, iPod touch 3rd generation, iPad


•Realistic Firearms & Game play
•Various Mission types & locations
•Intense animations
•Calculate wind & distance to make your shots
•Takes a steady hand to hit your targets
•Beautiful Graphics & Scenery
•Immerse yourself with life-like Audio
•21 Diverse & Challenging missions
•Practice ranges to tone your skills
•Track your stats locally to your device
